title: 256: Mother’s Day + The Kardashians + Wild Dentist Stories + Snow White Controversy
itunes:title: 256: Mother’s Day + The Kardashians + Wild Dentist Stories + Snow White Controversy
description:
Today The Broads sit down for a “fireside chat” where they talk about what’s been going in their lives - their different mother’s day stories, Jess’ recent dental drama, Bekah’s tooth nightmare, Jess’ embarrassing laughing gas episode, getting parasites, and lice - yikes! They also discuss their Kardashian Mother’s Day theory and the recent Snow White controversy and their thoughts!


***Join The Chatty Bros on Friday for their take on recent pop culture drama!


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***STAMPS.COM: Go to stamps.com and use code CHATTY to get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale!

***FAB FIT FUN: Use code CHATTY21 for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM + for a limited time only, annual members will receive an extra gift valued at $125 with their purchase while supplies last!

***CAVIAR: Download the Caviar app and use offer code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***THRIVE MARKET: Get $20 off your first order AND an exclusive FREE gift by going to THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY
